name: BulletScope
description:
Fight space bosses based on the Horoscope in this randomly generated bullet hell. The bosses attacks will be random, so every playthrough will be different! 

How to Play

WASD and Space or Left Stick and A/X 

Credits

Desmazio: Programming, SFX
Nicaness: Art

Made for 2021 Bullet Hell Jam
Theme: 10 seconds (boss attack will change every 10 seconds)

Assets
  • Music made by Matthew Pablo
  • Explosions made by ansimuz
  • Backgrounds made by DinV Studio
